source_objects.title: Sales
source_objects.description: Improve your sales skills with courses on sales promotion, mastering sales calls, mastering sales meetings, sales persuasion skills, cold calling skills, closing sales and more.

items.title: Sales Training: Practical Sales Techniques
items.headline: Sales Hacking: Essential sales skills, sales strategies and sales techniques to sell just about anything!
objectives_summary: Enjoy selling by befriending customers
Close deals with confidence
Be organised and efficient

items.title: Customer Service Mastery: Delight Every Customer
items.headline: Master Customer Service using this practical customer care course
objectives_summary: Be flooded with ideas on how to delight customers
Stand out from competitors with unique customer experiences
Create customers who are loyal for life and sing your praises to friends and family

items.title: Business Development & B2B Sales for Startups- Sales Valley
items.headline: The Complete Startup Playbook for Business Development & B2B Sales to learn Lead Generation, Pitching, & Closing Deals.
objectives_summary: Students will learn the PROVEN Sales Valley Methodology to build business relationships and generate sales
How to sell and generate meetings remotely and be productive while working from home
All the different types of business development deal structures you can use to grow your business

items.title: LinkedIn Marketing, Lead Generation & B2B Sales for LinkedIn
items.headline: LinkedIn Machine: The LinkedIn MasterClass to learn LinkedIn Marketing, Lead Generation, Business Development, B2B Sales
objectives_summary: How generate a massive amount of leads using cutting edge sales & marketing LinkedIn lead generation strategies
How to optimize your LinkedIn Profile to get 10x more visibility and generate leads
How to convert LinkedIn leads and conversations into REAL meetings via phone or in-person

items.title: Learn to Sell Anything by Grant Cardone
items.headline: Learn sales basics, techniques, and strategies that will give you the skills to sell anything.
objectives_summary: Sell your idea, service, product to anyone with confidence.

items.title: Lead Generation Machine: Cold Email B2B Sales Master Course
items.headline: Schedule meetings emailing small to large companies for business development, B2B, startup, consultants, & entrepreneurs
objectives_summary: You'll learn our PROVEN cold email methodology to get meetings with anyone and grow your business
How to sell and generate meetings remotely and be productive while working from home
How to build a Lead Generation Machine to get consistent leads every month

items.title: Sales Machine: The Sales Training B2B Master Course
items.headline: Learn Sales Strategies & Sales Techniques to Sell ANYTHING for Entrepreneurs, Startup, B2B Sales, & Business Development
objectives_summary: Students will learn the PROVEN Sales Machine Methodology to build business relationships and generate sales
How to sell anything using your own authentic personality without sounding "salesy"
How to INSTANTLY build rapport with anyone by mastering body language and tonality

items.title: Customer Success Manager: Fundamentals to your CSM career

visible_instructors.name: Gustavo
visible_instructors.title: Gustavo Escobar Henríquez
visible_instructors.job_title: Helping businesses generate quality leads and sales

visible_instructors.name: Digital Life
visible_instructors.title: Digital Life Academy
visible_instructors.job_title: Develop your skills to succeed in a digital world

items.headline: The foundations to become a great Customer Success Manager in a tech company. A very well paid profession on the rise
objectives_summary: Have a better understanding of what your job as Customer Success Manager will be like
Understand the fundamental principles of Customer Success. Which will be the foundation for your career as a CSM
Be more prepared for a Customer Success Manager job interview (we will not cover interview skills, your will be more prepared for the interview because you will know about customer success)

items.title: Business Development For Startups and Tech Companies
items.headline: Unlock massive growth using the business development channel. Learn pitching, BD strategy, cold emailing, & deal closing
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be armed with everything you need to dominate business development.

You'll learn strategy, cold emailing, cold calling, pitching, selling, how to close deals, build a network, manage partners, generate leads, and much more including the human psychology behind all of this

items.title: Cold Calling for B2B Sales: How to Prospect over the Phone

visible_instructors.name: Derek
visible_instructors.title: Derek Shebby
visible_instructors.job_title: We Help Individuals Become Top Sales Performers

items.headline: B2B Sales Skill: How to Cold Call over the Phone with Purpose, Navigate through Gatekeepers and Set Client Meetings
objectives_summary: Learn directly from an ACTUAL Sales Director of Training for a Fortune 500 Company!
Prepare for an Effective Prospecting Session
MASTER the Cold Calling Phone Navigation Process Which Will Improve Your Ratios Over the Phone!

items.title: Sales Skills Training: Consultative Selling Master Class

visible_instructors.display_name: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.name: Lawrence M.
visible_instructors.title: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Author & Leadership Coach

items.headline: Sales Training - Professional B2B Selling Skills for Consultants, Entrepreneurs and all Who Bring in the Business!
objectives_summary: How to sell consulting and other high value services in the spirit of service
How to Sustain a Lasting Professional Relationship with Clients
Building Your Personal Brand

items.title: Smart Marketing with Price Psychology
items.headline: Improve online marketing success with behavioral science research on pricing for your business and marketing
objectives_summary: Price your product or service to maximize revenue
Understand how consumers perceive and think about prices
Run promotions that make people think they're getting an amazing deal

items.title: Sales Training – Everyone sells!
items.headline: This course will give you extensive knowledge about the whole sales process.
objectives_summary: Recognize and understand the components of a sale
Identify and implement strategies of the sales process
Apply selling tactics and techniques

items.title: Supply Chain: Demand Planning (Sales Forecasting and S&OP)
items.headline: S&OP: Generate Unconstrained Demand & Measure Sales Forecast Accuracy
objectives_summary: Reflect reality of market demand and then drive a balanced sales forecast.
Measure forecast accuracy & apply forecasting improvement steps.
Generate rolling forecast for wider horizons for business growth & capacity planning.

items.title: Sales Skills - How to sell value instead of price

visible_instructors.name: Amaro
visible_instructors.title: Amaro Araujo
visible_instructors.job_title: Bestselling Author, International Sales & Negotiation Expert

items.headline: Skills and best practices for every sales rep to move away from price discussions to value creation negotiations
objectives_summary: Learn how to move away from a simple "vendor" to a position of strategic supplier.
How to use value as the main focus of sales discussions
Have deeper discussions with your customers to understand their real needs

items.title: Sales Skills & Negotiation Skills - Selling Masterclass 2021

visible_instructors.title: Mark Timberlake
visible_instructors.name: Mark
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Online Training Courses For Beginners

items.headline: Step By Step Negotiation Skills / Sales Training For Beginners - Learn To Negotiate & Sell & Become A Master Salesman
objectives_summary: This course will teach you how to become a successful sales consultant.
You will understand how the sales process works from start to finish.
This course will help you get the skills you need to get the best from any negotiation and sales situation.
